nodes.bodyText:
According to the other UIs that we have in the Admin Portal we usually give a small description of the feature if there is no data to be shown. Shall we provide a doc link in the description on how to configure workflows? @bhathiya WDYT?
The issue is we cant identify whether the user is coming for the first time to this UI or whether he is a user already using this feature who has approved previous requests.

nodes.bodyText: We discussed offline and IMO we shouldn't talk about server-level configs in UI. It doesn't make sense for tenants, for example in the cloud. If those configs are in the UI and the user who sees it, has access, then we can mention. So after discussing we concluded to keep only the 1st line. @ruthryi can you please fix and merge this asap?
